description: Windy, chilly, rugged adventures call for Ferrosi. Long-time award winner and best seller, Ferrosi is the soft shell collection infused with movement-mirroring stretch and durable, abrasion-resistant fabric for whatever you encounter outside. These pants stay cool during long approach hikes, move with you while talus wrangling and high-stepping on the sharp end, and block wind during long hours of belaying up high.
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi 3/4 Pants - Mens
